definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: There is stronger sense of responsibility, with society honor versus dishonor view.
sentences.chinese: 有較強的責任感，和社會榮辱觀。

sentences.english: Teachers should be responsible and time-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 教師要有責任感且要時間觀念很強。

sentences.english: This affirms the brand’s identity and responsibility to gain customers online.
sentences.chinese: 這會強化品牌形象和責任感，從而獲取更多的用戶。

sentences.english: They acknowledge that holding a part-time job can teach teens about responsibility and teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 他們承認做兼職工作能使青少年有責任感和團隊精神。

sentences.english: This is one of the reasons that he writes The Reason of Church Government, this intense sense of obligation that he feels.
sentences.chinese: 他所感受到的那種強烈的責任感，是他寫的原因之一。

sentences.english: Continue cultivating an eco-conscious community that fosters a sense of personal responsibility to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 積極創建環保社會，培養公民對環境保護的責任感。

sentences.english: The cultural quality high has the self-control, understands the life, the heavy sentiment has the family sense of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 文化素質高有涵養，懂生活，重感情有家庭責任感。

sentences.english: Increase their level of responsibility and authority.
sentences.chinese: 增加他們的責任感和權威性。

sentences.english: Effectively increasing the sense of responsibility and sense of emergency of maintaining the stability of colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 要切實增強維護高校穩定工作的責任感和緊迫感。

sentences.english: Sport imbues in young people a sense of responsibility and team work.
sentences.chinese: 體育使年輕人感受到了責任感和團隊精神。

sentences.english: It is this solidarity which forms the substratum upon which rests Chinese responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 正是這種團結，支撐着中國人的責任感。

sentences.english: Your boss will believe you are orderly and responsible.
sentences.chinese: 這樣老闆會認爲你守紀律，有責任感。

sentences.english: There is in all animals a sense of duty that man condescends to call instinct.
sentences.chinese: 所有的動物都有一種責任感，而人高傲的稱之爲本能。

sentences.english: Diana was not short of wit or dignity or a sense of duty.
sentences.chinese: 戴安娜一點也不缺乏智慧，尊嚴和責任感。

sentences.english: Everybody is accountable, from the head of the company down to the lowest-level employee.
sentences.chinese: 從最高層的領導到最低層的員工，人人樹立責任感。

definition: determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to attach importance to sth/to value
